first_blood.name: First Blood
first_blood.description: Solve your first problem on Codeforces

comfort_zone.name: Comfort Zone
comfort_zone.description: Solve 20 problems with a rating of 1000 or lower

breaking_barriers.name: Breaking Barriers
breaking_barriers.description: Solve your first problem with a rating greater than 1800

tag_collector.name: Tag Collector
tag_collector.description: Solve at least one problem from 10 different tags

pick_your_team.name: Pick Your Team
pick_your_team.description: Be friends with 10 users on Codeforces

never_give_up.name: Never Give Up
never_give_up.description: Face the challenge of trying problems without solving them for the first time

community_helper.name: Community Helper
community_helper.description: Make your first contribution on Codeforces
